rows.text: @global.app_name is an app designed by IDEMS International and Parenting for Lifelong Health to support the scale up of Crianza con Conciencia+ in Mexico. The content herein is available under an open source Creative Commons International 4.0 license. It was developed in collaboration with key partners:
